description:
### Context

Agriculture produce prices
This dataset is for agriculture produce prices on Jan 15th, 17th, 18th and 19th of 2021 at various mandis(markets) across India.

### Content

The datasets has below mentioned columns

state : Name of the state
district : Name of the district in state
market : Probably should be name of the mandi(Here it is the name of the city\district where the mandi is present)
commodity : Name of the agriculture produce
variety : Varient name of the agriculture produce. Eg: Hybrid
arrival_date : Date of the produce's arrivel at mandi
min_price : Minimum price
max_price : Maximum price
modal_price : Average price

### Acknowledgements
Data-Source : https://data.gov.in/resources/current-daily-price-various-commodities-various-markets-mandi/api


### Inspiration
I come form a family of agricultural background. Being a small scale farmer my father has never seen a sizable profit in his lifetime of farming and advises me against farming. I am trying to understand how I can make it profitable for him!
title: Agriculture produce prices
